interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Misfits: Season 2 (DVD+UltraViolet)
Review Date: 2015/05/05
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, BBC, All BBC Titles
Product Description: ['Misfits: Season 2 (DVD+UltraViolet)', "The Misfits are back on DVD 1/29 for another season of Sex, Drugs, and Superpowers! Fuelled with its usual irreverent humor, the second season of Misfits has an array of new characters crashing into the Misfits' world, and is even bigger, bolder and brasher than the last. The second series kicks off where the first ended, with Alisha, Simon, Nathan, Kelly and Curtis still on community service and still trying to adapt to their new lives. But what's new is the mysterious, masked figure watching over them from afar... someone who looks remarkably like a real-life superhero, and who seems to know everything about them. Is he protecting them? Or is he a threat? As the gang tries to piece together the clues to discover the true identity of their new stalker, it soon becomes apparent that the masked man harbors a secret that could change their world forever...", ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '4 hours and 36 minutes', 'Digital Copy Expiration Date': 'January 29, 2015', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.67 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BBCW1000279724DVD', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '4 hours and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 29, 2013', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Excellent! I wish though that the descriptions of DVD s would include which region..luckily this is for north America ... Fantastic second season...at first I thought I was too old to get into a series starring would be teens...but apparently I'm not...super fun and interesting show...and if you're especially fond of British shows then you'll love this!
Review Title: this misfit loves misfits!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
The Greatest American Hero - The Complete Series (Free Cape and Notebook Included) [DVD]
William Katt  (Actor),     Connie Sellecca  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Comedy
['Believe it or not, he\x92s walking on air! William Katt stars as mild-mannered high school teacher Ralph Hinkley, whose close encounter with aliens leaves him with a red super-power suit that only he can control. But when Ralph promptly loses the instruction manual, the safety of mankind is left in his fumbling hands. Now with the help of his attorney girlfriend Pam Davidson (Connie Selleca) and FBI agent Bill Maxwell (Robert Culp), the world\x92s most unlikely flying crime fighter is ready for action. Who could it be? Believe it or not, he\x92s THE GREATEST AMERICAN HERO! Michael Pare and Faye Grant co-star in this awesome \x9180s hit created by Stephen J. Cannell that featured such guest stars as Joe Mantegna, Markie Post, Bob Saget, Rick Dees, June Lockhart, David Paymer, Barbara Hale, André The Giant, Dixie Carter, Don Drysdale and more. This deluxe set also includes interviews, with cast and crew, and the unaired spinoff series pilot "The Greatest American Heroine".']
{'Format': "Box set, Color, DVD, Full Screen, Collector's Edition, NTSC", 'Contributor': 'William Bogert, Jeff Ray, Jesse D. Goins, Glenn R. Cannell', 'Number of discs': '13'}
i bought this for my brother for christmas, since we have such fond memories of it as kids. christmas day he calls and says that he and his girlfriend are flying around their apartment with the cape on. they love the instruction manual and aparently there is some episode of a attempted greatest american heroine...but didnt make it. he is normally someone who doesnt open collector things so i was shocked when i found he had. he said he couldnt help himself. anyway, excellent product.
instant hero

Christopher Daniel Barnes  (Actor),     Tom Conti  (Actor),     Rick Rosenthal  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD

{'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Giancarlo Giannini, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Tom Conti, Rick Rosenthal, JoBeth Williams', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified, French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 45 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.31 x 7.52 x 0.63 inches; 2.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2238190', 'Director': 'Rick Rosenthal', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 45 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 3, 2005', 'Actors': 'Christopher Daniel Barnes, Tom Conti, Giancarlo Giannini, JoBeth Williams', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Studio': 'Paramount Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
this is an awesome movie. if anyone loves comedies with light romance this is the movie for you. i dont like sticky sappy junk, but i do like a movie in which to people wind up together because of strange circumstances (gives me hope that i dont have to go out looking). anyway, you will laugh alot and there are no dull points.
i love this movie!!
One Foot in the Grave - Season 1
Richard Wilson  (Actor),     Annette Crosbie  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy
['Product Description', 'One Foot in the Grave: Season One (DVD)', "The BAFTA-nominated series about the growing pains of growing old is finally on DVD! Forced into early retirement, Victor Meldrew optimistically tries to adjust to years of leisure with his wife Margaret. If only events -- coincidences, misunderstandings, bureaucratic inefficiencies and sheer bad luck -- didn't conspire against him.", ']]>', 'Amazon.com', 'Think of', 'One Foot in the Grave', 'as a British version of', 'Curb Your Enthusiasm', ": Cranky, misanthropic Victor Mildrew (the wonderfully bilious Richard Wilson) perceives himself as the only sane man in a world out to drive him mad--a world in which yoga instructors abruptly keel over, a dead cat appears in his freezer, a man in a bee costume uses his loo, and an escaped snake crawls into his luggage. Of course, Victor can dish it out too; he gives a political candidate a severe tongue-lashing and has a vacuum cleaner duel with an old man who's even more cantankerous than Victor. Only his long-suffering wife Margaret (sweet-tempered Annette Crosbie,", 'Calendar Girls', ',', 'An Unsuitable Job for a Woman', ') provides Victor with any serenity--even as he destroys hers! Wilson had a long career before', 'One Foot in the Grave', '(including the series', 'Tutti Frutti', ", costarring with Emma Thompson and Robbie Coltrane), but this show became a phenomenon, giving a voice of outrage to the disenfranchised (young and old alike) in Margaret Thatcher's political era. But politics were always secondary to humor, and anyone with a taste for scathing invective and madcap plots will bask in Wilson's indignity. Written by David Remnick, creator of", 'Jonathan Creek', '.', '--Bret Fetzer']
{'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Annette Crosbie, Richard Wilson, David Renwick', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 51 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 27, 2007', 'Actors': 'Richard Wilson, Annette Crosbie', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'BBC Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'David Renwick', 'Number of discs': '1'}
i used to watch this series a long time ago when wxxi carried it and it is just as funny as i remembered. now understand it isnt blatent in your face funny, its dry and kind of a sad funny, which all in all doesnt sound funny but it is. if you have never seen this show i would start with later in the series and then go back. i love it.
great british stuff

profile:
The user continues to exhibit a strong affinity for nostalgic and comedic television and film, particularly favoring light-hearted content that evokes positive memories. Their recent engagement with British comedy, specifically illustrated by their adoration for shows that blend irreverent humor with unconventional narratives, reinforces their appreciation for stories that reflect on aging and the absurdities of life. This interaction highlights their enthusiasm for series that feature endearing characters facing unexpected challenges, showcasing their desire for relatable and memorable entertainment.

Their proactive engagement is evident in their detailed reviews, which reveal a keen interest in high-quality formats such as collector's editions, reflecting their value for well-produced content that enhances the viewing experience. The user's enjoyment of series aimed at younger demographics, while simultaneously acknowledging their own age, demonstrates an openness to diverse narratives that spark joy and connection. This preference aligns with their overarching desire for humorous storytelling that resonates emotionally, fostering family connections through shared laughter.

Overall, the user's profile showcases a joyful exploration of comedy that is both nostalgic and reflective, underpinned by a commitment to refined content presentation and a celebration of British humor, affirming their continued love for light-hearted narratives that uplift and entertain.
